channel.title: v1.4.1 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases
channel.description: Recent content in v1.4.1 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases

item.title: Test the trim related option update for old volumes
item.description: Related issue https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/5218 Test step Given Deploy Longhorn v1.3.2 And Created and attached a volume. And Upgrade Longhorn to the latest. And Do live upgrade for the volume. (The 1st volume using the latest engine image but running in the old instance manager.) And Created and attached a volume with the v1.3.2 engine image. (The 2nd volume using the old engine image but running in the new instance manager.) When Try to update volume.
